text.0: Haribhadra: Dhuttakkhana (a Jaina satire in Prakrit)
text.1: Based on the ed. Kornelius Krümpelmann, Frankfurt / M. 2000.

text.44: Unless indicated otherwise, accents have been dropped in order

text.60: dhuttāṇa sayāṇegā samāgayā kaha vi hiṃḍaṃtā
text.65: sara-vaṇṇa-bheya-kusalā tesi pahū paṃc' ime kamaso
text.66: Mūlasiri Kaṃḍarīo Elāsāḍho Saso ya Khaṃḍavaṇā  /
text.68: dhuttīṇaṃ paṃcasayā Khaṃḍavaṇāe ya navari parivāro  /
text.69: savvāṇa vi tāṇa pahū Mūlasirī loya-vikkhāo
text.75: bhukkh'attā beṃti tahiṃ ko amhaṃ dejja bhattaṃ ti
text.76: aha bhaṇai Mūladevo jaṃ jeṇa suyaṃ va samaṇubhūyaṃ vā  /
text.77: so taṃ kaheu savvaṃ miliyāṇ' eyāṇa dhuttāṇaṃ
text.78: jo taṃ na pattiejjā asacca-vayaṇaṃ ti teṇa savvesiṃ  /
text.82: so dhuttāṇa ahivaī mahāmaī atthi sattha-ṇimmāo  /
text.83: mā deu kiṃci kassa vi iya bhaṇie Mūladeveṇa
text.84: te savve viya bhaṇiyā iya hou susohaṇaṃ tae bhaṇiyaṃ  /
text.85: kiṃtu tumaṃ paḍhamaṃ ciya kahehi jaṃ te samaṇubhūyaṃ
text.86: aha bhaṇai Mūladevo jaṃ aṇubhūyaṃ mae taruṇa-bhāve  /
text.91: mattaṃ pavvaya-mettaṃ pecchāmi ya gayavaraṃ iṃtaṃ
text.94: attāṇo ya asaraṇo kattha nilukkāmi haṃ ti ciṃtaṃto  /
text.95: to sahasā ya aigao kamaṃḍaluṃ maraṇa-bhayabhīo
text.96: aha so vi matta-hatthī ūsaviya-karo sarosa-ratt'accho  /
text.98: to haṃ bhaya-saṃbhaṃto samaṃtao vidduyaṃ paloyaṃto  /
text.100: gīvāĕ niggao haṃ hatthī vi mamāṇumaggao niṃto  /
text.102: aham avi ya navari purao Gaṃgaṃ pecchāmi raṃgira-taraṃgaṃ  /
text.105: juvai-hiyaya vv' agāhaṃ uyahi vva sudūra-parapāraṃ
text.106: paham annaṃ alahaṃto to haṃ isu-veya-vāhiṇiṃ sigghaṃ  /
text.107: bāhāhiṃ samuttiṇṇo gopayam iva Bhārahiṃ viulaṃ
text.110: dhāreūṇa ya Dhāraṃ payao ahivaṃdiūṇa Mahaseṇaṃ  /
text.111: saṃpatto Ujjeṇiṃ tubbhehiṃ samaṃ ca milio haṃ
text.112: to jai saccaṃ eyaṃ to me heūhiṃ pattiyāveha  /
text.113: aha mannaha aliyaṃ taṃ dhuttāṇaṃ deha to bhattaṃ
text.114: aha bhaṇai Kaṃḍarīo ko bhaṇihī tumam asacca-vayaṇaṃ ti  /
text.117: paribhaṇai Mūladevo so hatthī kuṃḍiyāĕ kaha māo  /
text.118: kaha bhamio chammāsaṃ kamaṃḍale tammi vaṇahatthī
text.119: suhuma-cchiddeṇa kamaṃḍalāŏ kaha niggao ahaṃ so ya  /
text.122: kaha Gaṃgā uttiṇṇā bāhāhiṃ mae sudūra-parapārā  /
text.124: aha bhaṇai Kaṃḍarīo jaṃ summai Bhārahe purāṇe ya  /
text.125: taṃ jai savvaṃ saccaṃ to saccaṃ tujjha vi ya vayaṇaṃ
text.126: hatthī kamaṃḍalummī ahaṃ pi māo kahaṃ ti jaṃ bhaṇasi  /
text.128: Baṃbhāṇassa muhāo vippā khattiya-jaṇo ya bāhāsu  /
text.129: ūrūsu niggayā kira vaisā suddā ya pāesu
text.130: Baṃbhāṇassa sarīre jai māo ettio jaṇa-samūho  /
text.131: to kaha kamaṃḍalummī na māsi taṃ vaṇagaya-samaggo
text.132: annaṃ ca Baṃbha-Viṇhū uḍḍhaṃ ca aho ya be vi dhāvaṃtā  /
text.133: aṃtaṃ jassa na pattā vāsa-sahasseṇa divveṇa
text.134: liṃgaṃ mahappamāṇaṃ kaha māyaṃ tass' Umā-sarīrammi  /
text.135: evaṃ jai kuṃḍiyāe hatthī māo tti ko doso
text.136: annaṃ ca imaṃ suvvai risiṇā Vāseṇa Bhārahe 'bhihiyaṃ  /
text.138: kīo vaṃso bhaṇṇai tahiṃ jāyā Kīyaga tti bhaṇṇaṃti  /
text.140: tīe vi natthi putto to sā risi-āsamammi risim ekkaṃ  /
text.141: ārāhiuṃ payattā teṇa vi so sāhio caruo
text.142: bhaṇiyā teṇa ya risiṇā eyaṃ caruyaṃ tumaṃ kuḍaṃgammi  /
text.143: bhuṃjāhi pahiṭṭha-maṇā hohī te tattha putta-sayaṃ
text.144: sā taṃ paribhuttuṃ je vaṃsa-kuḍaṃgammi to gayā sagihaṃ  /
text.145: kassai kālassa tahiṃ Gaggali-ṇāmo risivaro tti
text.146: vaṃsī-jāla-paviṭṭho carai tavaṃ navari tattha pauma-sare  /
text.148: khuhiyassa sukka-biṃduṃ paḍiyaṃ nālīĕ Kīyago paḍhamo  /
text.150: jaha jaha nijjhāi muṇī accharasaṃ pavara-rūva-lāvannaṃ  /
text.151: taha taha khirai ya bīyaṃ jāyaṃ tahiṃ Kīyagāṇa sayaṃ
text.152: vaṃsī-ṇālīŏ risī nikkhiviuṃ niyayam ālayaṃ patto  /
text.153: so cciya vaṃsa-kuḍaṃgaṃ rāyā rakkhāvae niccaṃ
text.156: jai vaṃsa-samuppannaṃ bhāya-sayaṃ Kīyagāṇa māi tahiṃ  /
text.157: to kaha kamaṃḍalummī na māsi taṃ vaṇagaya-samaggo
text.158: vāsa-sahassaṃ Gaṃgā jaḍāsu vāmohiyā jai hareṇaṃ  /
text.160: laggo vāl'agg'aṃte hatthī ahayaṃ ca niggao kaha nu  /
text.161: jaṃ bhaṇasi taṃ suṇejjasu purāṇa-sui-āgayaṃ vayaṇaṃ
text.162: Viṇhū jagassa kattā so kira eg'aṇṇavammi logammi  /
text.166: tassa kira paṃkaya-ttho Baṃbho nāhīĕ pauma-gabbhāo  /
text.168: evaṃ kamaṃḍalu-gīvāĕ niggao jai tumaṃ gaya-samaṃ pi  /
text.169: hatthī vāl'agg'aṃte laggo to ettha kim ajuttaṃ
text.171: jaṃ pi ya bhaṇasi guṇāgara kuṃḍiya-gīvāĕ niggao kim ahaṃ  /
text.172: Bhāraha-pasiddham ettha vi vayaṇaṃ suṇa paccaya-ṇimittaṃ
text.173: divvaṃ vāsa-sahassaṃ Baṃbhāṇo tappaī tavaṃ raṇṇe  /
text.174: to khuhiyā tiyasa-gaṇā bhaṇaṃti kaha hojja se vigghaṃ
text.177: khuhio bīya-ṇisaggaṃ karei vihuṇai niyaṃsaṇaṃ tāhe  /
text.180: ko itthīhiṃ na khuhio muttūṇa jiṇaṃ Mahāvīraṃ
text.182: ahayaṃ ca surāhivaī Haro Harī tihuyaṇa-variṭṭhā
text.184: anne vi evam āī tava-satta-ṇihī jayammi vikkhāyā  /
text.186: tā gaṃtūṇaṃ sigghaṃ Tilottamā uttamā sura-vahūṇaṃ  /
text.189: gaṃtuṃ vibhussa purao divvaṃ naṭṭaṃ payāsei
text.194: daṭṭhūṇa naccamāṇiṃ Baṃbhā eg'iṃdio vva saṃvutto  /
text.196: nāūṇa tassa bhāvaṃ to sā saṃgaya-maṇohara-suvesā  /
text.198: to taṃ apecchamāṇo Baṃbhāṇo maṇasi maṇasijābhihao  /
text.199: taṃ daṭṭhūṇa sataṇho karei bīyaṃ tao vayaṇaṃ
text.200: etto 'vareṇa taiyaṃ cautthayaṃ kuṇai uttareṇaṃ so  /
text.202: to tassa pamattassa ya Tilottamāgaya-maṇassa Ruddeṇaṃ  /
text.203: taṃ vayaṇaṃ paṃcamayaṃ naheṇa ukkhuṃṭiyaṃ sahasā
text.206: tatth' uppanno see balavaṃto Seyakuṃḍalī nāma  /
text.208: to so bhaya-saṃbhaṃto nāsaṃto Bayariyāsame patto  /
text.209: tattha Harī niyamattho bhikkhaṃ dehi tti saṃlatto
text.210: tā teṇa takkhaṇaṃ ciya mukka-sirā appaṇo nilāḍammi  /
text.212: vāsa-sahasseṇa vi taṃ na bharijjai tīĕ ruhira-dhārāe  /
text.213: taṃ ruhiram aṃgulīe Pasuvaiṇā ḍohiyaṃ navariṃ
text.216: so Ruddeṇ' āṇatto pajujjhio Seyakuṃḍalīĕ samaṃ  /
text.218: to geṇhiūṇa donni vi savvehi suravarehiṃ miliehiṃ  /
text.219: dinno Sakkassa Naro Sūrassa samappio bīo
text.222: to kāle saṃpatte Sūro Kuṃtīĕ rūva-ummatto  /
text.223: kaya-saṃjoo tīe kucchīĕ jaṇei taṃ gabbhaṃ
text.225: to kiṃ tumaṃ na nīsarasi kuṃḍi-gīvāĕ Mūlasirī
text.227: Gaṃgā aṇora-pārā kaham uttiṇṇa tti bhaṇasi me jaṃ tu  /
text.228: ettha vi paccaya-jaṇaṇaṃ suṇehi Rāmāyaṇe vittaṃ
text.232: bhaṇio kaha te uyahī tiṇṇo Haṇuyaṃta so bhaṇai
text.234: tava prasādāt tava ca prasādād bhartuś ca te devi tava prasādāt  /
text.235: sādhūnate yena pituḥ prasādāt tīrṇo mayā goṣpadavat samudraḥ  //
text.237: jai teṇa samuttiṇṇo tirieṇa mahoyahī duruttāro  /
text.238: to kiṃ tae nar'uttama na hojja Gaṅgā samuttiṇṇā
text.239: jaṃ bhaṇasi kaha nu Dhārā chammāsā dhāriyā sireṇa mae  /
text.240: ettha vi me suṇa heuṃ diyāi-sui-āgayaṃ vayaṇaṃ
text.242: avayarasu maṇuya-loyaṃ saggāo bhaṇai sā tāhe
text.243: ko maṃ dhariuṃ sakko nivaḍaṃtiṃ bhaṇai Pasuvaī ahayaṃ  /
text.244: dhāremi tao paḍiyā dhariyā sīseṇa Pasuvaiṇā
text.245: divvaṃ vāsa-sahassaṃ jai dhariyā Jaṇhavī Umā-vaiṇā  /
text.246: to kaha na dharesi tumaṃ chammāsaṃ sireṇ' udaya-dhārā
text.250: aisaio Mūlasirī Kaṃḍariyaṃ bhaṇai bhaṇasu ettāhe  /
text.251: jaṃ diṭṭhaṃ jaṃ ca suyaṃ aṇuhūyaṃ jaṃ ca te ihaiṃ
text.252: aha bhaṇai Kaṃḍarīo aviṇaya-puṇṇo mi āsi bālatte  /
text.254: parihiṃḍaṃto ya ahaṃ patto des'aṃta-saṃṭhiyaṃ gāmaṃ  /
text.261: tassa ya heṭṭhe jakkho kamaladal'akkho guṇehiṃ parikiṇṇo  /
text.263: jakkhassa tassa jattā vaṭṭai bahujaṇa-samāulā muiyā  /
text.267: to haṃ sakouhallo uvāgao taṃ mahāyaṇa-samūhaṃ  /
text.268: jakkhassa kame namiuṃ ramamāṇe ghoḍahe pecchaṃ
text.270: kalayala-ravaṃ kareṃtā paḍiyā corā navari tattha
text.271: to so sabāla-vuḍḍho sa-itthio jaṇavao sapasuvaggo  /
text.272: aha ghoḍaehiṃ sahio vāluṃkaṃ aigao savvo
text.273: tattha vi te ghoḍahae ramaṃta-pecchā jaṇe ya muiya-maṇe  /
text.274: corā vi paḍiṇiyattā naṭṭho gāmo tti jaṃpaṃtā
text.275: navari tahiṃ pasuvaggo caramāṇo āgao suvīsattho  /
text.276: ekkāĕ pasūĕ tao oiliyaṃ cibbhaḍaṃ sahasā
text.277: sā ayagareṇa ghatthā so vi ya ḍheṃkīĕ navari oilio  /
text.278: sā tatth' eva nilīṇā tuṃge Vaḍapāyave viule
text.279: tassa ahe khaṃdhāro navari ṭhio rāiṇo ya matta-gao  /
text.282: to ravai meṃṭha-vaggo keṇāvi gao samukkhitto
text.283: soūṇa tāṇa saddaṃ saṃpattā saddavehiṇo johā  /
text.285: chinnā ya tīĕ paṃkhā se sīsaṃ hatthiehiṃ dakkhehiṃ  /
text.286: sā vilavaṃtī paḍiyā pavvaya-sihara vva mahi-vaṭṭhe
text.287: phālāviyā ya rannā poṭṭe diṭṭho ya ayagaro viulo  /
text.288: sagaḍassa īdaro viva khoḍī viva mahiyale paḍiyā
text.289: aha bhaṇai nara-var'iṃdo phālijjau esa ayagaro viulo  /
text.290: eyassa vi mā majjhe māṇusa-tiriyaṃ ca hojjāhi
text.291: aha phāliyammi uyare diṭṭhā sā chāliyā mahākāyā  /
text.292: tīe vi uyara-majjhe ramaṇijjaṃ cibbhaḍaṃ diṭṭhaṃ
text.293: hī hī aho mahallaṃ ti cibbhaḍaṃ jāva jaṃpae rāyā  /
text.294: to ghoḍayā vi ramiuṃ navari ṭhiy'āojja-vaṃsa-karā
text.296: niggaṃtuṃ ca pavatto vālukkāo tao jaṇa-samūho  /
text.297: jaha salabhāṇa ya seṇā reppha-bilāo viṇikkhamai
text.298: namiūṇa nara-var'iṃdaṃ to so sacauppao jaṇo savvo  /
text.299: niya-ṇiya-ṭhāṇāiṃ gao ahaṃ pi patto imaṃ nayariṃ
text.300: eyaṃ me aṇubhūyaṃ paccakkham ih' eva māṇuse loe  /
text.301: jo me na pattiyāyai dhuttāṇaṃ deu so bhuttiṃ
text.302: aha bhaṇai Elasāḍho pattijjāmo na kiṃci saṃdeho  /
text.303: paḍibhaṇai Kaṃḍarīo gāmo kaha cibbhaḍe māo
text.305: kiṃ tuha Viṇhupurāṇaṃ kaṇṇa-sui-pahaṃ na pattaṃ te
text.306: puvviṃ āsi jagam iṇaṃ paṃcamahābhūya-vajjiyaṃ gahiraṃ  /
text.311: jai māyaṃ tā gāmo kaha nu na māejja vāluṃke
text.312: annaṃ ca imaṃ suvvai Araṇīpavvammi Dhammaputtassa  /
text.314: so kila jug'aṃta-samae uyaeṇ' eg'aṇṇavī-kae loe  /
text.318: evaṃ-vihe jagammī pecchai Naggohapāyavaṃ aha so  /
text.319: Maṃdaragiri vva tuṃgaṃ mahāsamuddaṃ va vitthiṇṇaṃ
text.320: khaṃdhammi tassa sayaṇaṃ acchai tahiṃ bālao maṇ'abhirāmo  /
text.322: hattho pasārio se risiṇā eh'ehi vaccha bhaṇio ya  /
text.323: khaṃdhe mamaṃ vilaggasu mā marihisi uyaya-vāhīe
text.324: teṇa ya ghettuṃ hattho oilio so risī tao tassa  /
text.326: divvaṃ vāsa-sahassaṃ kucchīe so risī paribhamaṃto  /
text.327: aṃtaṃ na c'eva patto viṇiggao risivaro tatto
text.328: jai dārayassa uyare sasurāsura-māṇusaṃ jayaṃ māyaṃ  /
text.329: to cibbhaḍammi gāmo kaha nu na māejja Kaṃḍariya
text.330: ḍheṃkoyare ayagaro tassa pasūe ya cibbhaḍaṃ uyare  /
text.331: tattha vi ya jaṇa-samūho kaha māo bhaṇasi suṇasu imaṃ
text.333: vutto tassa ya uyare sasela-vaṇa-kāṇaṇā puhaī
text.336: acchaṃto kaha na mao eyaṃ me pattiyāveha
text.337: bhaṇai ya Elāsāḍho taddiyasaṃ c'eya niggao taṃ si  /
text.338: puhaī kaha na vivajjai Vasudeva-suyassa poṭṭa-tthā
text.339: poṭṭe kisi-vāṇijjaṃ saṃgāmā bahuvihā ya āraṃbhā  /
text.340: āvāha-vivāhā vi ya ussava-pasavā ya vaṭṭaṃti
text.341: kaha puṇa havejja eyaṃ jayaṃ tu uyare vi jassa jaṃ vutthaṃ  /
text.343: kattā ahaṃ ti Baṃbhā bhaṇai jao vayaṇa-bāha-ūrūhiṃ  /
text.344: pāesu ya nikkhaṃtaṃ cāuvvaṇṇaṃ jagam iṇaṃ ti
text.346: taṃ si mama ceḍa-rūvaṃ na jujjae erisaṃ vottuṃ
text.348: pavisehi majjha uyare jā peccha savibbhamaṃ puhaiṃ
text.349: maha c'eva samuppanno jala-sayaṇe nāhi-ṇiggae paume  /
text.350: Baṃbhāṇa taṃ na sohasi guru-purao ettiyaṃ vottuṃ
text.352: jassa pabhāveṇ' ummilliyāiṃ taṃ c'eva kaha kayagghāiṃ  /
text.355: aha bhaṇai Kaṃḍarīo porāṇa-suīsu kattha ya suyaṃ te  /
text.356: ḍheṃkī mahappamāṇā jass' uyare ettiyaṃ māyaṃ
text.358: jaha kira dhaṇuṃ paviṭṭhā Mahihara-ṇāgā ya Aggī ya
text.360: jo āruhio viṃdhai vāme acchimmi sūyariyaṃ
text.361: jijjai kalāsu kusalā kira kaṇṇā tassa Dovaī souṃ  /
text.362: rāyāṇo taṃ dhaṇuhaṃ āruhiuṃ to samāḍhattā
text.363: na cayaṃti āruheuṃ aha Sasipālo mahābalo tāhe  /
text.364: saṃdheūṇa payatto navari dhaṇuṃ taṃ ayatteṇaṃ
text.365: to Kaṇheṇaṃ tāhe Garulo nāgā gayā ya saṃkhā ya  /
text.367: saṃdhei to vi jāhe tā Sasi-Sūr'Aggi-uyahi-selā ya  /
text.368: pakkhittā savva cciya Vasuhā aha dhaṇu-hare tammi
text.369: addh'aṃgula-mette kira asaṃdhie Kesaveṇa bāṇaṃ so  /
text.370: pāeṇa vi moyaviuṃ tāhe paḍio saha-dhaṇū ṇaṃ
text.371: Pattheṇa ya taṃ gahiyaṃ aha aibhāreṇa na sahaī dharaṇī  /
text.372: Bhīmassa tao hatthe āruhiyaṃ taṃ payatteṇa
text.373: kaṇṇa-vidiṇṇeṇa sareṇa viṃdhiuṃ Ajjuṇeṇa taṃ rāhaṃ  /
text.376: jai taṃ mahalla-dhaṇuyaṃ nāg'Aggi-gayā ya aigayā jattha  /
text.377: to kaha na hoi ḍheṃkī mahaī jatth' ettiyaṃ māyaṃ
text.378: Rāmāyaṇe vi suvvai Sīyā-haraṇe Jaḍāu-giddho tti  /
text.380: teṇa vi se ruṭṭheṇaṃ Caṃdāhāseṇa lūḍiyā paṃkhā  /
text.381: to luya-paṃkho paḍio Maṃdara-siharo vva mahi-vaṭṭhe
text.382: Sīyāe so bhaṇio sīlavaīṇaṃ saīṇa teeṇaṃ  /
text.383: daṭṭhūṇa Rāma-dūyaṃ hohiṃti puṇo vi te paṃkhā
text.384: kassai kālassa tao Haṇuyaṃto Rāhaveṇa āṇatto  /
text.386: ciṃtei ya Haṇuyaṃto aho girī esa unnao 'īva  /
text.387: etth' āruhiūṇa ahaṃ pulaemi samaṃtao vasuhaṃ
text.388: saṃlatto ya khageṇaṃ ko 'si tumaṃ eriseṇa veseṇa  /
text.389: so bhaṇai Rāma-dūo ahaṃ ti Sīyaṃ gavesāmi
text.390: bhaṇio Jaḍāuṇā so Rāma-vahū Rāvaṇeṇa vilavaṃtī  /
text.394: aham avi Sīy'aṭṭhāe jujjhaṃto nisiyarāhiveṇ' evaṃ  /
text.395: asiṇā duve vi paṃkhe chettūṇa ajaṃgamo mukko
text.396: aha bhaṇai Vāu-putto jaṃ si ṭhio Rāvaṇassa jujjheṇa  /
text.397: jaṃ vā vi amha kahiyaṃ hohi tti tumaṃ pi piyabhāgī
text.398: soūṇa dūya-vayaṇaṃ to se jāyā puṇaṇṇavā paṃkhā  /
text.399: āyāseṇ' uppaio gao ya saggaṃ niruvasaggaṃ
text.401: ākhyāsyati khagaḥ svarge pitur Daśarathasya me  /
text.403: Maṃdara-sihar'āgāro jai āsi Jaḍāu khahayaro giddho  /
text.404: tā kaha na hoi ḍheṃkī Kaṃḍariya mahappamāṇāo
text.405: Elāsāḍheṇ' evaṃ Kaṃḍario jaṃpio bhaṇai tāhe  /
text.406: Elāsāḍha iyāṇiṃ kahehi jaṃ te samaṇubhūyaṃ
text.408: aha bhaṇai Elasāḍho ahayaṃ taruṇattaṇe daviṇa-buddhī  /
text.411: ettha bilaṃ ettha raso eso so pavvao jahiṃ dhāū  /
text.413: laddho ya āgamo me jaha puvva-disāĕ joyaṇa-sahasse  /
text.414: navaraṃ gaṃtūṇa giriṃ sahassavehī raso tahiyaṃ
text.418: gaṃtūṇa giri-paese ukkhiviya silaṃ rasaṃ gahiuṃ
text.419: pariḍhakkiūṇa ya bilaṃ silāĕ to āgayaṃ imaṃ bhavaṇaṃ  /
text.420: to jāo me vibhao Dhaṇaya-sariccho rasa-pasāyā
text.421: aha paṇaiṇi-parikiṇṇo thuvvaṃto taha ya māgaha-saehiṃ  /
text.428: corā sāmattheuṃ rattiṃ paḍiyā mama gihammi
text.432: parisaṃciyassa atthassa kāraṇe maraṇam āgayaṃ tehiṃ  /
text.433: sa-bhuya-bala-jjiyam atthaṃ na demi hariuṃ viciṃteuṃ
text.435: sahasā ya uṭṭhio haṃ dhaṇuaṃ ghettūṇa sara-sahassaṃ ca  /
text.438: jatto valāmi tatto pesemi Jam'ālayaṃ core
text.439: to corāṇa sayaṃ me muhutta-metteṇa ghāiyaṃ tahiyaṃ  /
text.441: to maṃ khaṃḍākhaṃḍiṃ kāuṃ sīsaṃ ca chinniuṃ majjha/
text.442: Bayarīe ṭhaviūṇaṃ musiūṇa gharaṃ gayā corā
text.445: taṃ sīsaṃ sūr'uyae diṭṭhaṃ loeṇa Bayari-uvarimmi  /
text.446: bayarāiṃ khāyaṃtaṃ esa sa-jīo tti kāūṇa
text.447: majjhaṃ aṃgovaṃgā jaṇeṇa piṃḍevi meliyā turiyaṃ  /
text.449: eyaṃ me aṇubhūyaṃ sayam eva imammi māṇuse loe  /
text.450: jo puṇa na pattiyai maṃ dhuttāṇaṃ deu so bhuttiṃ
text.451: bhaṇai Saso sabbhūyaṃ kaha sakkā bhāṇiuṃ aliyam eyaṃ  /
text.453: Jamayaggī āsi risī pattī tass' āsi Reṇuyā nāmaṃ  /
text.455: diṭṭho ya ṇāĕ rāyā Assāvahio maṇo ya se khuhio  /
text.456: na namaṃti tao rukkhā tāhe Jamayaggiṇā Rāmo
text.458: teṇa vi sīsaṃ chinnaṃ jhaḍatti piu-vayaṇa-kāreṇa
text.459: bhaṇai tao Jamayaggī varasu varaṃ putta jo tuhaṃ iṭṭho  /
text.460: so bhaṇai majjha māyā puṇo vi jīvaṃtiyā hou
text.461: iya hou tti pabhaṇie jāyā sā takkhaṇeṇa sajjīvā  /
text.462: jai sabbhūyaṃ eyaṃ tumaṃ pi jīvo 'si taṃ saccaṃ
text.465: annaṃ ca imaṃ suvvai Suṃda-Ṇisuṃdā sahoyarā sūrā  /
text.467: sāmattheuṃ surehiṃ Tilottamā tesiṃ vaha-ṇimittaṃ tu  /
text.473: jaṃ kāyavvaṃ taṃ āṇaveha devehiṃ jaṃpiyaṃ iṇamo  /
text.476: iya hou tti ya bhaṇiuṃ Tilŏttamā geṇhiuṃ sur'āṇattiṃ  /
text.477: pattā khaṇeṇa ya tahiṃ Suṃda-Ṇisuṃdāsurā jattha
text.479: vithaḍ'unnaya-thaṇa-vaṭṭā do vi jaṇe te palobhei
text.481: to te mayaṇa-vasagayā tīĕ kae jujjhiuṃ aha pavattā  /
text.482: nihaṇaṃ ca gayā donni vi paropparaṃ sattha-ghāehiṃ
text.484: strīṇāṃ kṛte bhrātṛyugasya bhedaḥ saṃbandhibhede striya eva mūlam  /
text.487: accharasā jai evaṃ Tilottamā nimmiyā sura-gaṇehiṃ  /
text.488: to kaha tujjha vi aṃgā lāijjaṃtā na laggejjā
text.489: annāṇ' aṃgāvayavā jai laggā saṃmilissiyā saṃtā  /
text.490: to sasarīrāvayavā bhaṇasu tuhaṃ kiṃ na laggaṃti
text.491: suvvai ya Pavaṇa-taṇao bālatte Aṃjaṇaṃ ti nāmeṇaṃ  /
text.492: jaṇaṇiṃ pucchai ammo ko me chuhiyassa āhāro
text.493: rattāiṃ vaṇa-phalāiṃ āhāro tujjha teṇa aha sūraṃ  /
text.495: saya-sikkaro kao so jaṇaṇī se daṭṭhuṃ taṃ paiṇṇ'aṃgaṃ  /
text.499: to Pavaṇo parikuvio pāyāle pavisiuṃ ṭhio tāhe  /
text.501: gaṃtuṃ ca tattha diṭṭho pasāio sura-varehiṃ so Pavaṇo  /
text.502: aṃgāiṃ tassuyassa vi saṃghāeuṃ kaŏ sajīo
text.503: ekkā ya tassa haṇuyā na ya diṭṭhā sura-varehiṃ savvehiṃ  /
text.504: haṇuyāĕ esa anno Haṇuyaṃto to kao nāmaṃ
text.505: jai saccaṃ Pavaṇa-suo khaṃḍākhaṃḍi-kao vi saṃmilio  /
text.506: to kaha sakkā vottuṃ tujjha auvvaṃ vayaṇam eyaṃ
text.517: nissallo tti pabhāvā jhaḍitti sattī vi nissariyā
text.519: saṃchinna-bhinna-gattā te vi ya savve samāsatthā
text.521: vivaiṇṇa-sarīrā vi ya jai savve vāṇarā samujjīyā  /
text.522: khaṃḍa-sahasso kaŏ Elasāḍha to jīvasi tumaṃ pi
text.524: annaṃ ca jaṇa-pagāsā nihiyā suya-putthaesu bahuesu  /
text.525: kiṃ vā tumhehi imā na suyā Mahaseṇa-uppattī
text.528: taṃ soūṇa pauttiṃ devā kira tihuyaṇammi ādannā  /
text.533: ekkassa vi tā kīrai kajjaṃ abbhatthiehiṃ jiya-loe  /
text.534: kiṃ puṇa mahāṇubhāvo jaṃ jaṃpai sura-samūho tti
text.535: jassa ya kaeṇa savve devā ciṃtovahiṃ samoiṇṇā  /
text.536: tassa ya jatteṇa tumaṃ Huyavaha ekko samattho 'si
text.538: to tuha kayāi vilio mehuṇa-tattiṃ visajjejjā
text.539: Vesāṇareṇa bhaṇiyaṃ ko dhāvai abhimuhaṃ muhuttaṃ pi  /
text.540: iharā vi Umā-vaiṇo kiṃ puṇa eyārise bhāve
text.542: jassa raī peya-vaṇe ko tassa jaṇo samalliyai
text.545: vahio uddhuya-liṃgo ko taṃ vivuho samālavai
text.546: kiṃ bahuṇā jaṇa-majjhe jo naccai uddhieṇa liṃgeṇaṃ  /
text.547: balavaṃto Vajjaharo tassa vi nissaṃsayaṃ bhāi
text.548: jai kaha vi Sūlapāṇī kuppai Himagiri-guhā-paviṭṭhassa  /
text.549: ko jāṇai kiṃ me hohii tti mā saṃkaḍe chuhaha
text.551: etth'aṃtare ya bhaṇio sappaṇayaṃ Bahuyaloyaṇeṇ' evaṃ  /
text.553: mā bhāhi Umā-vaiṇo Huyavaha jeṇ' eriso Umā-satto  /
text.554: gaya-turaya-purisa-damaṇo kiṃ ca imo āgamo na suo
text.555: hatthī dammai saṃvacchareṇa māseṇa dammai turaṃgo  /
text.556: mahilā puṇa kira purisaṃ damei ekkeṇa divaseṇaṃ
text.558: jaṃ bhaṇai Umā-devī karei taṃ Pasuvaī akajjaṃ pi  /
text.559: kiṃ vā dehāṇugayaṃ Umaṃ vahaṃto na diṭṭho te
text.560: muṃcasu āsaṃkam iṇaṃ Ruddo ruṭṭho vi te sarīrassa  /
text.561: na karei kiṃ pi pīḍaṃ Pavvai-cittāvarakkhāe
text.562: iya hou tti ya Jalaṇo gaṃtuṃ Himavaṃtagiri-guhaṃ viulaṃ  /
text.565: huṃ huṃ Umāĕ bhaṇio uddhuya-liṃgo 'ṇalaṃ bhaṇai
text.566: uṭṭha(?) ni-y-aṃciya-vayaṇaṃ piba reyaṃ mā karehi vikkhevaṃ  /
text.567: Ruddeṇa Huyavaho ghaḍaghaḍassa to pāio reyaṃ
text.568: uyara-gaeṇa ya reeṇa so palitt'aggiṇā va ḍajjhaṃto  /
text.569: muya-maraṇo saṃbhaṃto kaha kaha vi mahoyahiṃ patto
text.571: dāūṇam aṃguliṃ Huyavaheṇa uggālio jale reo  /
text.573: tappabhiiṃ ciya summai jaṇa-sui-vāy'āgayaṃ imaṃ vayaṇaṃ  /
text.577: saram egaṃ gaṃtuṃ je reya-visesaṃ samuggilai
text.578: jaṃ bhaṇṇai Kittiya saha uyaṃ ti phuḍa-viyaḍa-pāyaḍaṃ tāo  /
text.580: tā majjium āḍhattā tammi sare nayaṇa-maṇ'abhirāmammi  /
text.583: pauma-sare majjittā puṇar avi tā jois'ālayaṃ pattā  /
text.584: paidivasaṃ ciya tāsiṃ chaṇha vi parivaḍḍhae uyaraṃ
text.585: kāl'aṃtareṇa keṇa ya samayaṃ ciya tā tahiṃ pasūyāo  /
text.587: tā tā vi vimhiya-maṇā daṃsaṃti paroppar'ekka-m-ekkassa  /
text.588: pecchasu accheram iṇaṃ logammi abhūya-puvvaṃ tu
text.589: bāh'ūrū ya sarīraṃ sīsāṇi ya niyaya-ṇiyaya-ṭhāṇesu  /
text.590: laggāiṃ takkhaṇa cciya Mahaseṇo chammuho jāo
text.593: causu ya disāsu jahiyaṃ dhāvai logo bhavaṃtara-dis'aṭṭhā  /
text.594: sīseṇa ya chammāsaṃ dharei Dhāraṃ bar'aṭṭhāe
text.596: to tujjha na laggejjā tāiṃ kim eg'uyara-vatthāiṃ
text.597: chinnā nāsā kaṇṇo ya laggae loya-viiyam eyaṃ pi  /
text.600: to bhaṇai Elasāḍho puriso kaha chinnaeṇa sīseṇaṃ  /
text.601: bhukkh'atto bayarāiṃ khāeuṃ sakkae kaha nu
text.602: bhaṇai Saso Rāhū kira sīsa-cchinno jayammi sui-vāo  /
text.603: taha viya gayaṇe hiṃḍai ābhaṃsai caṃda-sūre ya
text.604: aha bhaṇai Elasāḍho kaha gammai taṃ vigiṭṭham addhāṇaṃ  /
text.605: kaha vā vi joyaṇa-sayaṃ kamehiṃ akkamai bhūmīe
text.606: paḍibhaṇai Saso janne Balissa Viṇhū diyāi-veseṇa  /
text.607: tiṇṇi kame jāittā harai sa-selaṃ vasumaiṃ so
text.608: jai savvā vi vasumaī tiṇṇi na puṇṇā kame Mahumahassa  /
text.609: ko doso jai tujjhaṃ ekka-kamo joyaṇa-sayaṃ tu
text.610: puṇar avi Elāsāḍho bhaṇai silā sā mae aimahallā  /
text.611: kaha ukkhittā garuyā eyaṃ me pattiyāvehi
text.612: bhaṇai Saso kiṃ na suyaṃ tumae Rāmāyaṇe kahijjaṃtaṃ  /
text.618: loe vi payarai suī vaḍḍhaṃtī meiṇī Mahumaheṇaṃ  /
text.620: jai teṇa samukkhittā na najjaī katthaī ṭhieṇaṃ ti  /
text.621: ukkhivasi tā tumaṃ pi ya dharaṇiyala-ttho silā do vi
text.622: Elāsāḍho jāhe Saseṇa aisaṃdhio bhaṇai tāhe  /
text.623: jaṃ te suyam aṇubhūyaṃ kahehi savvaṃ aparisesaṃ
text.625: aha bhaṇai Saso ahayaṃ niyayaṃ chettaṃ gao saraya-kāle  /
text.627: chettammi ya acchaṃto tatto Pavvayavarāŏ oyariuṃ  /
text.630: vivalāium acayaṃto paribhamami tahiṃ tahiṃ c'eva
text.633: patto ya so vaṇagao ārusio tila-dumaṃ samaṃteṇaṃ  /
text.635: teṇa bhamaṃteṇa ya so cālijjaṃto tile davadavassa  /
text.636: vāsāsu jala-haro iva jala-ṇivahaṃ muṃcaī ghoraṃ
text.637: tila-cakkeṇa vva tilā te savve pīliyā gayavareṇaṃ  /
text.638: tattha pavūḍhā sariyā telloyā nāma nāmeṇaṃ
text.639: khutto ya vaṇagao so khala-calaṇīe ya tella-paṃkammi  /
text.640: āraḍiūṇa ya virasaṃ bhukkhiya-tisio mao hatthī
text.643: kusio diiṃ ca kāuṃ bhario tellassa so mae hatthī  /
text.644: tāhe dasa tella-ghaḍe pāuṃ bhakkhemi khala-bhāraṃ
text.645: tellassa supaḍipuṇṇaṃ taṃ diiyaṃ geṇhiuṃ gao gāmaṃ  /
text.647: niyayaṃ bhavaṇam aigao puttaṃ pesemi tilla-diiyassa  /
text.648: jāhe u na pāveī rukkhaṃ pāḍittu to geṇhe
text.649: eyaṃ me aṇubhūyaṃ sayam eva imammi māṇuse loe  /
text.650: jo na u pattiyai mahaṃ so deu mahāyaṇe bhattaṃ
text.652: atth' esa āgamo me Bhāraha-Rāmāyaṇe ya suo
text.653: Khaṃḍā Saseṇa bhaṇiyā Bhāraha-Rāmāyaṇe purāṇe vā  /
text.654: eyārisāiṃ ya saheuyāiṃ bhaṇa kattha bhaṇiyāiṃ
text.656: kaha tila-dumo mahallo tellāṇa ya kaha mahāṇaī vūḍhā  /
text.657: kaha pīyā ya dasa-ghaḍā kaha khala-bhāro mae khaio
text.658: Khaṃḍāĕ Saso bhaṇio saccaṃ taṃ loya-bāhiro taṃ si  /
text.659: kiṃ kaiyāi suo te bālo vi jaṇo payaṃpaṃto
text.660: jaha kira Pāḍaliputte nimmaviyā māsa-pāyavā bherī  /
text.661: to kiṃ so tilarukkho mahappamāṇo na hŏjjāhi
text.662: suvvai ya Bhārahammi vi gayāṇa puṇa ettha dāṇa-salileṇaṃ  /
text.669: sariyā tayā pavattā to telloyā kaha na hoi
text.672: bhattaṃ taṃḍula-kuṃbhaṃ mahisaṃ taha majja-ghaḍa-sahassaṃ ca  /
text.673: jaṃ tassa bhatta-pāṇaṃ uvaṇīyaṃ teṇa taṃ bhuttaṃ
text.674: jai Baga-rakkhasa-bhattaṃ bhuttaṃ Bhīmeṇa to kim egeṇaṃ  /
text.675: bhāreṇa vi taṃ jimio bhāra-sayaṃ kiṃ na bhakkhesi
text.677: so piyai ghaḍa-sahassaṃ khāyai n'ege nara-sae ya
text.679: dasahiṃ ghaḍaehiṃ kiṃ Sasa kiṃ pannāsaṃ na pīyā te
text.680: annaṃ ca imaṃ suvvai purāṇa-sui-ṇiggayaṃ imaṃ vayaṇaṃ  /
text.681: asurāṇa jaha vah'atthā Agatthiṇā sāyaro pīo
text.684: pīyā ya teṇa risiṇā vāsa-sahassaṃ ca bhāmiyā uyare  /
text.685: to Jaṇhueṇa mukkā kira bhaṇṇai Jaṇhavī teṇaṃ
text.686: jai uyahiṃ Agatthī ṇaṃ pīyā Gaṃgā ya Jaṇhu-risiṇā ya  /
text.687: to jai dasa tella-ghaḍā pīyā ya tae kim accheraṃ
text.688: bhaṇai Saso so diio sumahaṃto kaha mae samukkhitto  /
text.689: aha ukkhitto kaha puṇa nīo egāgiṇā gāmaṃ
text.691: nūṇaṃ Sasa na kayāi vi suo tume Garula-vittaṃto
text.693: dohiṃ vi tāhiṃ savattīhiṃ kiṃ pi kila paṇiyayaṃ chippaṃ
text.695: jā paṇiyayammi jippai tīe dāsattaṇaṃ ca kāyavvaṃ  /
text.697: Viṇayā jiya Kaḍḍūe karei dāsattaṇaṃ savattīe  /
text.700: Viṇayā kira guru-bhārā dāsatte parama-dukkhiyā jāyā  /
text.701: tatth' eva sā pasūyā tīse aṃḍa-ttayaṃ jāyaṃ
text.702: dāsattaṇa-mokkh'aṭṭhā bhiṃdai tatth' egam aṃḍayaṃ Viṇayā  /
text.703: tattha kila aṃḍayammī jāyā vicchū asaṃpuṇṇā
text.704: dummaṇa-maṇā ya Viṇayā paritappai aṃḍayaṃ viṇaṭṭhaṃ me  /
text.705: annaha ciṃtemi ahaṃ taṃ pi ya me annahā hoi
text.707: kaha vi durāsāĕ mae aṃḍaṃ bhinn'atthie bhinnaṃ
text.710: kaihi vi divasehiṃ tao puṇo vi biiy'aṃḍayaṃ bhinnaṃ
text.712: biiy'aṃḍammi aṇūrū jāo kila so vi māyaraṃ bhaṇai  /
text.713: ammo tumhehi imaṃ kim akāle aṃḍayaṃ bhinnaṃ
text.714: jo te maṇoraho ciṃtio tti so pūrio mae hoṃto  /
text.715: eṇhiṃ ayaṃgamo kiṃ karemi ahayaṃ parāhīṇo
text.717: eyaṃ pi tāva taiyaṃ parirakkhasu aṃḍayaṃ payatteṇa  /
text.718: jo ko vi ettha hohī so dukkha-vimukkhao tumhaṃ
text.719: raha-sārahī aṇūrū ṭhavio Sūreṇa jo jage Aruṇo  /
text.720: sayam eva ya Viṇayāe kameṇa tai'aṃḍayaṃ bhinnaṃ
text.727: eyārisāiṃ Viṇayā soūṇam abhikkhaṇaṃ ca rovaṃtī  /
text.728: pucchijjai Garuḍeṇaṃ roasi kiṃ kāraṇaṃ amme
text.730: rattiṃ divā ya duhiyā karemi āṇattiyaṃ tīse
text.731: kaha muccejjasi amme amaeṇaṃ taṃ ca jāṇai piyā te  /
text.732: kattha piyā Badarī-āsamammi Garuḍo gao tahiyaṃ
text.734: Badar'āsamammi gaṃtuṃ Garuḍo pāesu nivaḍio piuṇo  /
text.735: viyal'iṃdieṇa teṇa vi phāseṇ' uvalakkhio putto
text.736: Garuḍeṇa jaṃpiyaṃ bhukkhio mi bhaṇiyaṃ ca Kāsaveṇ' evaṃ  /
text.740: rattiṃ divā ya donni vi sara-saṃkhobhaṃ karemāṇā
text.741: bhakkhehi te tumaṃ gacchiūṇa mā putta bhukkhio accha  /
text.742: gaṃtūṇa ekka-m-ekkeṇa teṇa te do vi paribhuttā
text.744: tatto ya paḍiṇiyatto pecchai vaḍapāyavaṃ mahāviḍayaṃ  /
text.749: so tattha samallīṇo bhaggo vaḍapāyavo kaḍakaḍaṃto  /
text.750: mā hohī risi-vajjhā caṃcū vaḍapāyavaṃ guvilaṃ
text.751: to sahasā ukkhiviuṃ chāemāṇo vva naha-yalaṃ savvaṃ  /
text.755: vaḍaduma-laṃka-ṇimittaṃ Laṃkā-dīo tti to kayaṃ nāmaṃ  /
text.757: Himavaṃte gaya-kacchava bhakkheuṃ so gao piu-sayāsaṃ  /
text.758: bhaṇai ya tāya na dhāo bhakkhehi tao Nisāe tti
text.764: ko puṇa tassa uvāo amay'atthī Kāsav'aṃgao ahayaṃ  /
text.765: atthi uvāo jaha ghippai tti aidukkaro so u
text.768: gahaṇaṃ hojja na hojja va gahie vi uvaddavāṇegā
text.770: Kāsava-risi-vayaṇeṇaṃ gaṃtuṃ Garuḍeṇa do vi saṃpayayā  /
text.773: titteṇa Huyavaheṇa ya amaya-sayāsaṃ pavesio Garuḍo  /
text.774: gahiyaṃ ca neṇa amayaṃ devehiṃ vi kila samugghuṭṭhaṃ
text.775: amayaṃ kuṃḍa-tthaṃ ciya vihageṇ' egeṇa nīyam ukkhiviuṃ  /
text.776: soūṇam iṇaṃ vayaṇaṃ khuhiyaṃ sasurāsuraṃ bhuvaṇaṃ
text.777: jo jatto cciya devo sahasāmayam avahaḍaṃ nisāmei  /
text.778: so ahara-phuraṃt'oṭṭho tatto cciya maggio laggo
text.782: haṇa chiṃda bhiṃda giṇhaha mā muyaha rasāyala-gayaṃ pi
text.784: pariveḍhio ya bhaṇio amay'āhārī hao si tti
text.785: ekkatto cciya bhuvaṇaṃ ekatto Kāsav'aṃgao pakkhī  /
text.787: suragaṇa-sayaṃ sahassaṃ lakkhaṃ koḍiṃ pi causu vi disāsu  /
text.789: Viṇaya-suyassa surāṇa ya gayaṇayale vaṭṭae mahāghoraṃ  /
text.791: to so deva-samūho Garuḍeṇ' ekkeṇa raṇa-muh'āvaḍio  /
text.799: Garuḍeṇa caṃcuāe sayam ev' uppāḍiyaṃ picchaṃ
text.802: bhī-uvvigga-sasaṃbhamaṃ hā hā kim iyaṃ ti gaggir'ullāvā  /
text.804: bho bho savvagao viya pabhū ya sasurāsurassa loyassa  /
text.805: taha vi tumaṃ nīo iva sayaṇass' uvariṃ nirāvikkho
text.806: Garuḍo ya sahayaro te paḍisāhara vaṇa-davovamaṃ kovaṃ  /
text.807: mā mūḍho meccho iva paharasu niyaesu gattesu
text.808: risi-gaha-vayaṇaṃ souṃ imaṃ tu cakk'āuho vi ciṃtei  /
text.809: koh'āieṇa pecchasu mae sahāo hao hoṃto
text.813: Garuḍassa Aṇaṃtassa ya jāyā saṃdhī jhao kao Garuḍo  /
text.814: amayaṃ dāuṃ Viṇayaṃ moyai dāsattaṇāo tti
text.815: jai gaya-kacchabha-vaḍaduma Garuḍeṇ' uppāḍiyā ya nīyā ya  /
text.816: to ukkhivasi Sasa tayaṃ tumaṃ pi daiyaṃ subaddhaṃ pi
text.818: tā kaha na dharesi tumaṃ gaya-dīyaṃ tella-paripuṇṇaṃ
text.819: seū-baṃdhe viya vāṇarehiṃ negāiṃ joyaṇāiṃ girī  /
text.822: to jai putteṇa tuhaṃ rukkho ummūlio mahāviḍavo  /
text.823: dīyam apāveṃteṇaṃ to bhaṇasu tahiṃ kim accheraṃ
text.824: vaṇavāḍiya-bhaṃge vi ya Haṇuyaṃto mahiruhe mahāviḍave  /
text.825: ukkhaṇai ayatteṇaṃ jattha imo Khaṃdhao bhaṇio
text.829: ummūliyā samūlā tuha putto kiṃ na ukkhaṇai
text.830: aisaio bhaṇai Saso Khaṃḍāvāṇīĕ tattha dhuttīe  /
text.831: Khaṃḍaṃ bhaṇai iyāṇiṃ kahehi jaṃ taṃ samaṇubhūyaṃ
text.834: buddhīĕ ahiya-buddhī dhutte tulleuṃ vayaṇam iṇaṃ
text.835: olaggiya tti amhehiṃ bhaṇaha jai aṃjaliṃ kariya sīse  /
text.836: uvasappaha jai ya samaṃ to bhattaṃ demi savvesiṃ  // HaDh_5. 2 //
text.838: to te bhaṇaṃti dhuttā amhaṃ savvaṃ jagaṃ tulemāṇā  /
text.839: kaha eva dīṇa-vayaṇaṃ tujjha sayāse bhaṇīhāmo
text.841: avi uḍḍhaṃ ciya phuṭṭaṃti māṇiṇo na vi sahaṃti avamāṇaṃ  /
text.842: atthamaṇammi vi raviṇo kiraṇā uḍḍhaṃ ciya phuraṃti
text.844: pavaṇo cciya āhāro vaṃkaṃ caṃkammiyaṃ aparibhūyaṃ  /
text.846: īsi hasiūṇa to sā Khaṃḍāvāṇā bhaṇei bho suṇaha  /
text.847: akkhāṇayaṃ aṇaliyaṃ jaṃ aṇubhūyaṃ mae c'eva
text.850: navari ya kayāi ahayaṃ uṇhāyā maṃḍave suha-pasuttā  /
text.852: jāo teṇa suo me tāhe ciya jāya-mettao to so  /
text.853: āucchiūṇa ya mamaṃ katto vi gao aha khaṇeṇaṃ
text.854: to bhaṇaha kiṃ na saccaṃ jai vāeṇaṃ havejja putto tti  /
text.855: to n'atthi kā vi raṃḍā aputtiyā jīva-loyammi
text.856: taṃ bhaṇai Mūladevo suvvai loya-ssuīsu Pavaṇeṇaṃ  /
text.859: kajje sarejjasu tti ya jaṇaṇiṃ bhaṇiūṇa avakaṃto
text.861: Saṃtaṇuṇā tīĕ suo Vicittavirio tti saṃjaṇio
text.862: asue mayammi tammī Joyaṇagaṃdhāĕ sumario Vāso  /
text.863: saṃpatto ya khaṇeṇaṃ jaṇaṇi-sayāse risi-varo so
text.864: bhaṇio aha māūe putta aputtā na vaḍḍhae vaṃso  /
text.865: tā taha karehi vacchaya jaha hoi kulassa saṃtāṇo
text.866: teṇ' uddhario vaṃso Paṃḍu-ṇar'iṃdo jayammi vikkhāo  /
text.867: Dhayaraṭṭho ya nara-vaī Viduro ya mahāmaī jaṇio
text.868: bhāu-jjāyā tiṇṇi vi bhuttūṇaṃ dei tiṇha vī sāvaṃ  /
text.871: āhāre caiva yonau ca bījakarmaṇi yaḥ śuciḥ  /
text.872: tasya kṛcchrāgatasyāpi na pāpe ramate matiḥ
text.874: jai saccaṃ Pavaṇa-suo Bhīma-Haṇū navara paṭṭhio Vāso  /
text.875: uyara-viṇiggaya-matto to saccaṃ tujjha vī vayaṇaṃ
text.876: puṇar avi Khaṃḍāvāṇā bhaṇai sahī āsi majjh' Umā devī  /
text.879: teṇa vi me bala-jutto jāo putto mahāsatto
text.881: kaha teṇa na daḍḍhā haṃ raikajja-samāgayā saṃtī
text.882: aha bhaṇai Kaṃḍarīo Kuṃtī jai hoṃta daḍḍha Sūreṇaṃ  /
text.883: to ḍajjhaṃtā si tumaṃ saccaṃ taṃ n'atthi saṃdeho
text.884: Khaṃḍā bhaṇai puṇo me Jalaṇo āgarisio sura-varāṇaṃ  /
text.885: jo vayaṇaṃ teṇa vi me putto jāo jui-mahaṃto
text.886: dūrattho ḍahai Ravī Aggī aṃgehiṃ pharisio ḍahai  /
text.887: kaha teṇa na daḍḍhā haṃ Jalaṇeṇa samāgayā saṃtī
text.888: bhaṇai ya Elāsāḍho Jama-pattī Huyavaheṇa kira bhuttā  /
text.890: asamatta-suraya-kajjo Jalaṇo jā aigao Jamo tāhe  /
text.891: acayaṃto osariuṃ Jalaṇo tīe vi oilio
text.893: oiliūṇa Jamo vi ya dev'atthāṇiṃ aha paviṭṭho
text.894: devehiṃ ya so bhaṇio apatta-raiyassa sāgayaṃ tujjha  /
text.895: niggilai tao deviṃ tīĕ muhāo ya Jalaṇo vi
text.896: dhāvaṃto ucchinno Jameṇa to aigao vaṇaṃ gahaṇaṃ  /
text.897: kahio gaehiṃ to so tesiṃ vāyā hiyā teṇaṃ
text.898: jai saccaṃ Jama-pattī bhuttā Jalaṇeṇa n'eya sā daḍḍhā  /
text.899: to kaha ḍajjhihisi tumaṃ Jalaṇeṇa samāgayā saṃtī
text.900: Khaṃḍā bhaṇai puṇo me Erāvaṇa-vāhaṇo Sahass'accho  /
text.901: āgarisio mi so vī teṇa vi jāo mahaṃ putto
text.902: accharasāo mottuṃ kaha Iṃdo sevae maṇussīo  /
text.903: bhaṇai Saso kiṃ na suyā Goyama-pattī Ahilla tti
text.908: devehiṃ Goyamāo kaha vi payatteṇa moio Iṃdo  /
text.909: jaṃ tassa bhaga-sahassaṃ acchi-sahassaṃ tayaṃ jāyaṃ
text.910: Kuṃtīe Iṃdeṇa vi putto Pattho tti loya-vikkhāo  /
text.911: jāo evaṃ jai suo tujjha vi Iṃdeṇa ko doso
text.912: aha bhaṇai Khaṃḍavāṇā tubbhe jāṇaha kulaṃ ca gottaṃ ca  /
text.914: Pāḍaliputte nayare taṃ si suyā Nāgasamma-vippassa  /
text.916: sā bhaṇai n'avi ahaṃ sā tumhe sārikkha-vimhiyā majjhaṃ  /
text.919: nāmeṇa Daḍḍhiyā haṃ nīyā goehiṃ kammehiṃ
text.921: sippiya-sahassam ahiyaṃ jaṃ dhovai majjha vatthāiṃ
text.924: chaḍachaḍachaḍassa tahiyaṃ huṃ huṃ siṃṭā-ravaṃ kareṃtehiṃ  /
text.928: āyo ya mahāvāo samaṃtao pāyave ya bhaṃjaṃto  /
text.929: to teṇaṃ pavaṇeṇaṃ vatthāiṃ hiyāiṃ savvāiṃ
text.930: gacchaha tubbhe cuiyā rayaṃ ti kammāriyā mae bhaṇiyā  /
text.931: jo doso avarāho va ko vi so hohiī majjhaṃ
text.933: rāula-bhaeṇa to haṃ gohā-rūvaṃ karettu rayaṇīe  /
text.936: aha pacchimammi jāme bhaya-ciṃtā me samuppannā
text.937: gohaṃ camma-ṇimittaṃ maṃsa-ṇimittaṃ ca jaṇavao haṇai  /
text.938: to ko hojja uvāo jaha maraṇa-bhayaṃ na hojjāmi
text.939: kiṃ hojja kayaṃ su-kayaṃ kattha gayā nivvuī lahejjaṃ ti  /
text.943: dussīlā iva juvaī timira-paḍaṃ guṃṭhiyā gayā rayaṇī  /
text.945: dinno ya amha abhao rannā paureṇa cāu-vaṇṇeṇa  /
text.949: souṃ paḍahaga-saddaṃ to taṃ mottūṇa cūya-laya-bhāvaṃ  /
text.951: tassa ya sagaḍassa tahiṃ nāḍa-varattā ya tajjaṇīo ya  /
text.953: aha navari majjha piuṇā nāḍa-varattā ya maggamāṇeṇaṃ  /
text.955: to kiṃ etthaṃ saccaṃ bhaṇai Saso Baṃbha-Kesavā aṃtaṃ  /
text.956: na gayā jai liṃgassa u to kaha vayaṇaṃ tuha asaccaṃ
text.957: Rāmāyaṇe ya suvvai jaha Haṇuyaṃtassa āsi laṃgūlaṃ  /
text.963: jai saccaṃ laṃgūlaṃ sumahaṃtaṃ āsi Vāu-puttassa  /
text.964: to te mūsiya-cheppā kinna havai iddahā rajjū
text.965: annaṃ ca imaṃ suvvai porāṇa-suīsu niggayaṃ vayaṇaṃ  /
text.966: jaha kira Gaṃdhāri-varo raṇṇe Kuruvattaṇaṃ patto
text.967: rāyā āsī kira so mahābala-parakkamo ahiya-teo  /
text.971: tammi araṇṇammi ṭhiyā egāgī niggao navari Bhīmo  /
text.972: teṇ' ayagareṇa khaddho uvaladdha-suī ya Dhamma-suo
text.975: jāo puṇar avi rāyā jai saccaṃ to tumaṃ pi sabbhūyaṃ  /
text.976: gohā cūya-layā vi ya gaṃtūṇa puṇaṇṇavā jāyā
text.977: to bhaṇai Khaṃḍavāṇā dhutte evaṃ gae vi kajjammi  /
text.978: majjhaṃ kuṇaha paṇāmaṃ jāhe bhattaṃ payacchāmi
text.979: jai kaha vi parājijjaha savve vi ya samuiyā mae tubbhe  /
text.980: to tumha n'atthi loe kāṇā vi kavaḍḍiyā mullaṃ
text.981: to te bhaṇaṃti dhuttā ko satto nijjiṇittu amhehiṃ  /
text.982: māyā-ṇiyaḍi-pahāṇo Harī vi sakkaṃ jai havejjā
text.983: to sā avagaya-tosā te dhutte Khaṃḍavāṇaī bhaṇai  /
text.984: pecchaha ettāhiṃ ciya savve vi karemi haya-vayaṇe
text.985: tesiṃ vatthāṇa kae rāyāṇaṃ pucchiuṃ pari-y-aḍāmi  /
text.987: annaṃ ca mamaṃ cauro ceḍa-ruyā jāyayā cira-paṇaṭṭhā  /
text.988: tesiṃ ca kaeṇa ahaṃ parihiṃḍaṃtī ihaṃ pattā
text.989: te ceḍā tubbhe hi ya tāṇi ya vatthāṇi te parihiyāṇi  /
text.990: jai vi na pattiyah' eyaṃ to deha mahāyaṇe bhattaṃ
text.991: to te lajjiya-viliyā bhaṇaṃti aisaṃdhiyā tume amhaṃ  /
text.993: eyassa bharassa tumaṃ ekkā joggā jayammi vikkhāyā  /
text.995: sā bhaṇai vihasamāṇā puvviṃ vinnaviyayā mae tubbhe  /
text.996: bho gavvam uvvahaṃtā ohasaha jaṇaṃ abuddhīyā
text.997: to te bhaṇaṃti suṃdari cāyo ghaṭṭo kao havai jāhe  /
text.1000: to savve vi bhaṇāmo amhaṃ bhattaṃ payacchāhi
text.1001: bāḍhaṃ ti bhāṇiūṇaṃ peyavaṇaṃ sā gayā subīhaṇayaṃ  /
text.1022: evaṃ vihe masāṇe pecchai aviṇaṭṭhayaṃ vigaya-jīvaṃ  /
text.1023: acira-vimukkaṃ bālaṃ Khaṃḍā taṃ geṇhiuṃ ṇhavai
text.1026: diṭṭho ya ṇāĕ seṭṭhī āsaṇa-viṭṭho jaṇeṇa parikiṇṇo  /
text.1027: bhaṇio ya nāĕ bhāo suttiya-dhūyā mi duggaiyā
text.1030: seṭṭhī vāula-citto puṇo puṇo tīĕ uccaraṃtīe  /
text.1031: rusio bhaṇei purise sigghaṃ nīṇeha damiaṃ tti
text.1032: niggacchasu tti bhaṇiyā aha jaṃpai mā chiv' assa bālassa  /
text.1033: annaṃ ṭhāṇaṃ bappi-kkayaṃ ti to me ma pelleha
text.1035: niggaccheuṃ n'icchai tehiṃ ya purisehiṃ pelliyā sahasā  /
text.1036: dharaṇīyale nivaḍiā bhaṇai mahaṃ mārio putto
text.1037: hā majjha aṇāhāe nāho hohi tti ciṃtayaṃtīe  /
text.1039: bho pecchaha jaṇa samudaya imeṇa dhaṇa-gavvieṇa vaṇieṇa  /
text.1042: aha paharium āraddhā sīse ya ure ya sā asāhāraṃ  /
text.1043: bhaṇai ya seṭṭhī majjhaṃ bhaggaṃ bhikkhā-kavālaṃ tti
text.1045: aṇuṇei vilavamāṇiṃ kareha mā suyaṇu bolaṃ ti
text.1046: dinnā ya kaṇṇiyā se bhaṇiyā ghettūṇa vaccasū puttaṃ  /
text.1047: mā ruyasu mā ya kaṃdasu tuha ettiya jīvaṇaṃ dinnaṃ
text.1048: ghettūṇa kaṇṇiyaṃ mayaṃ kalevaraṃ ca sā tao aikkaṃtā  /
text.1051: tyāgena bhūtāni vaśībhavanti tyāgena vairāṇy api yānti nāśam  /
text.1052: paro 'pi bandhutvam upaiti dānāt tyāgo hi sarvavyasanāni hanti
text.1056: kāūṇa ya viṇioyaṃ tesiṃ dhuttāṇa sīya-vihurāṇaṃ  /
text.1059: bhaṇiyā ya Khaṃḍavāṇā sujīviyaṃ jīviyaṃ tujjha
text.1060: jaṃ te buddhi-balāo dhutta-jaṇo nijjiṇittu sayarāhaṃ  /
text.1062: sussikkhiyā vi purisā tāiṃ na jāṇaṃti jaṃpiyavvāiṃ  /
text.1063: jāiṃ asikkhiāo katto vi lahaṃti mahilāo
text.1064: paḍhiūṇa ya satthāiṃ purisā nāūṇa tesim atthāiṃ  /
text.1065: na samatthā paḍivayaṇe uppanna-maī jahā mahilā
text.1067: adhītya śāstrāṇi vimṛśya cārthān na tāni vaktuṃ puruṣāḥ samarthāḥ  /
text.1072: suvvai ya āgamammī jaha Kaṇho savva-bīya-majjha-gao  /
text.1074: jai savvagao Kaṇho ciṃtijjai jattha tattha so c'eva  /
text.1075: ciṃteṃtao vi so cciya tamhā so kiṃ viciṃtei
text.1076: annaṃ pi aliya-vayaṇaṃ suvvai loyammi niggayaṃ iṇamo  /
text.1079: uppatti Chammuhassa ya Narakubbara āsi tāṇaṃ ca
text.1080: Kaṇhassa ya niggamaṇaṃ jaha kovā Seyakuṃḍalī jāo  /
text.1084: jai hoṃti pavvayāṇaṃ puttā dhūyā kuḍuṃba-dhammo vā  /
text.1085: to taṃ imammi loe Jaṃbūdīve na māejjā
text.1087: saṃcālaṇam asahaṃtā jaha jutti-kayaṃ suvaṇṇa vva
text.1088: eyaṃ loiya-satthaṃ gaddaha-liṃḍa vva bāhire maṭṭhaṃ  /
text.1090: to te bhaṇāmi savve kusamaya-kussui-paheṇa muttūṇa  /
text.1093: taha kuṇaha nicchiya-maiṃ jaha darisaṇa-suddhi hoi parā
